mapper.select: select sh.JFKH as memberCode, sh.billno as invoiceNo, sh.str4 as onlineOrderNo, sh.str8 as couponOrderNo, sg.BARCODE as barcode, sg.CODE as code, sg.CATID as catid, sg.NAME as goodsName, sg.UNIT as unit, sg.JG as price, case when sh.ysyjh is not null then 0-sg.Sl else sg.Sl end as qty, case when sh.ysyjh is not null then 0-HJJE else HJJE end as amount, HJZK as discount, sh.rqsj orderTime, case when sh.ysyjh is not null then 'R' else 'S' end as orderType, decode(SYJH,'9002','SFA','9003','ECM','POS') as channel from dbusrposnew.salegoods sg ,dbusrposnew.salehead sh where sg.billno =sh.billno and TRUNC(sh.rqsj) >= date'${startDate}' and TRUNC(sh.rqsj) <= date'${endDate}' order by sh.rqsj
